title: Reykjavík, Iceland
description: Capital and largest city of Iceland, known for its geothermal energy and vibrant culture.

title: Oslo, Norway
description: Norway's capital, surrounded by forested hills and the Oslofjord.

title: Stockholm, Sweden
description: Sweden's capital, spanning 14 islands on the Baltic Sea.

title: Helsinki, Finland
description: Finland's southern capital on the shores of the Gulf of Finland.

title: Berlin, Germany
description: Germany's capital, with rich history and modern culture.

title: London, United Kingdom
description: Capital of the United Kingdom, an influential global city.

title: Paris, France
description: France's capital, famed for art, fashion, and the Eiffel Tower.

title: Lisbon, Portugal
description: Portugal’s coastal capital known for pastel-colored buildings and Fado music.

title: Madrid, Spain
description: Spain's central capital, home to the Prado Museum and lively plazas.

title: Rome, Italy
description: Italy's capital, home to ancient landmarks like the Colosseum and the Vatican.

title: Athens, Greece
description: Historical city often called the cradle of Western civilization.

title: Istanbul, Türkiye
description: Transcontinental city straddling Europe and Asia across the Bosporus Strait.

title: Cairo, Egypt
description: Egypt's sprawling capital near the Great Pyramids of Giza.

title: Nairobi, Kenya
description: Kenya’s capital and a gateway to safari destinations.

title: Johannesburg, South Africa
description: South Africa’s largest city and economic hub.

title: Cape Town, South Africa
description: Coastal city beneath Table Mountain, known for its harbor and biodiversity.

title: Moscow, Russia
description: Russia’s capital, home to the Kremlin and Red Square.

title: Dubai, United Arab Emirates
description: Global city known for modern architecture, shopping, and the Burj Khalifa.

title: Doha, Qatar
description: Qatar’s capital on the Persian Gulf, known for futuristic skyscrapers.

title: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
description: Saudi Arabia’s capital and largest city on the Arabian Peninsula.

title: New Delhi, India
description: India’s capital, part of the larger Delhi metropolitan area.

title: Bangkok, Thailand
description: Thailand’s buzzing capital, famed for ornate shrines and vibrant street life.

title: Beijing, China
description: China’s capital with millennia of history, including the Forbidden City.

title: Tokyo, Japan
description: Japan’s vibrant capital blending ultramodern and traditional culture.

title: Singapore
description: City-state at the tip of the Malay Peninsula, a global financial hub.

title: Sydney, Australia
description: Harbor city known for the Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

title: Auckland, New Zealand
description: New Zealand’s largest city, set between two harbors on the North Island.

title: San Francisco, United States
description: California city famed for the Golden Gate Bridge and hilly landscape.

title: New York City, United States
description: The most populous city in the U.S., a global center of culture and finance.

title: Toronto, Canada
description: Canada’s largest city, known for the CN Tower and multicultural neighborhoods.

title: Vancouver, Canada
description: Coastal seaport city in western Canada surrounded by mountains and water.

title: Mexico City, Mexico
description: Mexico’s high-altitude capital founded by the Aztecs as Tenochtitlan.

title: Lima, Peru
description: Peru’s capital on the Pacific coast, known for colonial architecture and cuisine.

title: Bogotá, Colombia
description: Colombia’s high-altitude capital with a historic center and vibrant arts scene.

title: São Paulo, Brazil
description: Brazil’s largest city and a major financial center in the Southern Hemisphere.

title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Coastal city known for Christ the Redeemer and Copacabana Beach.

title: Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Argentina’s capital, famed for European-style architecture and tango.

title: Santiago, Chile
description: Chile’s capital nestled in a valley encircled by the Andes and the Chilean Coast Range.

title: Honolulu, United States
description: Hawaii’s capital on Oʻahu, known for Waikiki Beach and volcanic landscapes.

title: Anchorage, United States
description: Alaska’s largest city, a gateway to wilderness and the Chugach Mountains.
